title: जीवन का उद्देश्य क्या है?
name: Aarav
description: जीवन का असली उद्देश्य क्या है?

stories.name: Self Realization
stories.answer: Jeevan ka purpose hai apne true self ko pehchanna – Atma ka gyaan.

stories.name: Service
stories.answer: Service, love aur compassion ke through humanity ko uplift karna hi jeevan ka asli uddeshya hai.

stories.name: Karma Yoga
stories.answer: Karma yoga – apne duties ko sincerity se nibhana hi jeevan ka aim hai.

stories.name: Bhakti
stories.answer: Bhakti aur meditation ke through Parmatma ko paana hi ultimate goal hai.

stories.name: Truth Seeking
stories.answer: Satya aur gyaan ki khoj hi jeevan ka asli maqsad hai.

stories.name: Inner Growth
stories.answer: Apne andar ke divine qualities ko jagana aur evolve karna hi jeevan ka uddeshya hai.

stories.name: World Betterment
stories.answer: Achhe karmo se duniya ko beautiful aur better banana hi jeevan ka role hai.

stories.name: Peace
stories.answer: Dukh-sukh me samta paakar peace ko experience karna hi jeevan ka aim hai.

stories.name: Liberation
stories.answer: Jeevan ka asli matlab hai janm-maran se mukti paana.

stories.name: Oneness
stories.answer: Parm satya ke saath ek roop ho jaana hi jeevan ka real purpose hai.

title: Soul & Body
name: Riya
description: आत्मा और शरीर का वास्तविक संबंध क्या है?

stories.name: Master & Vehicle
stories.answer: Atma is the master, sharir is the vehicle.

stories.name: Eternal & Temporary
stories.answer: Soul is eternal, body is temporary – atma sharir ko life deti hai.

stories.name: Temporary Stay
stories.answer: Sharir atma ka permanent ghar nahi hai, bas temporary stay hai.

stories.name: Sun & Reflection
stories.answer: Atma Surya jaisi hai, body uska pratibimb hai.

stories.name: Energy & Instrument
stories.answer: Atma energy hai, body uska instrument hai.

stories.name: Birth & Death
stories.answer: Body janm-maran leta hai, atma amar hai.

stories.name: Pilot & Plane
stories.answer: Relation of soul & body is like pilot & plane.

stories.name: True Self
stories.answer: Real 'main' = Atma, body to ek covering hai.

stories.name: Direction & Experience
stories.answer: Body experiences deta hai, par direction atma deti hai.

stories.name: Sadhan & Sadhya
stories.answer: Soul aur body ka relation hai – sadhan aur sadhya.

title: Truth
name: Kabir
description: सत्य एक है या अनेक रूपों में प्रकट होता है?

stories.name: One but Many Views
stories.answer: Satya ek hai, par drishti alag-alag hai.

stories.name: Sun Rays
stories.answer: Satya ek surya hai, jiske rays alag-alag form me hain.

stories.name: Different Levels
stories.answer: Truth ek hai, par human mind ke level ke hisaab se alag lagta hai.

stories.name: Formless Truth
stories.answer: Truth nirakar hai, par anek roopon me experience hota hai.

stories.name: All Religions
stories.answer: Sabhi dharm ek hi satya ki taraf le jaate hain.

stories.name: Unchanging
stories.answer: Satya ka swaroop badalta nahi, sirf expression alag hota hai.

stories.name: Ocean & Streams
stories.answer: Satya ek samudra hai, par dharayein alag dikhte hain.

stories.name: Experience
stories.answer: Satya har vyakti ke anubhav ke hisaab se alag lagta hai.

stories.name: Infinite Forms
stories.answer: Satya ek hai, par uske anant forms hain.

stories.name: Eternal Truth
stories.answer: Ultimate truth ek hi hai – eternal aur unchangeable.

title: Destiny or Freedom
name: Arjun
description: क्या मनुष्य वास्तव में स्वतंत्र है या भाग्य का दास है?

stories.name: Karma & Destiny
stories.answer: Manushya apne karmo se destiny banata hai – free bhi hai aur bound bhi.

stories.name: Seed & Farming
stories.answer: Freedom & destiny ek saath hain – beej fate hai, farming karma hai.

stories.name: Birth Conditions
stories.answer: Manushya kuch bandhan ke saath born hota hai, lekin karma se badal sakta hai.

stories.name: Past & Present Karma
stories.answer: Destiny past karma ka result hai, lekin present karma future create karta hai.

stories.name: Free Will
stories.answer: Human fully slave nahi hai – usko free will mili hai.

stories.name: Efforts Matter
stories.answer: Fate direction deta hai, par efforts usko badal dete hain.

stories.name: Soul Freedom
stories.answer: Atma free hai, par sharir aur situation limit karte hain.

stories.name: Boat & Current
stories.answer: Karma aur fate ka relation boat aur current jaisa hai.

stories.name: Choices
stories.answer: Manushya apne thoughts aur decisions se apni direction chunta hai.

stories.name: True Freedom
stories.answer: Atma hamesha free hai – destiny sirf sharir aur worldly cheezon tak simit hai.

title: God & Suffering
name: Meera
description: ईश्वर है तो दुख क्यों है, और दुख है तो ईश्वर क्यों है?

stories.name: Awakening
stories.answer: Dukh ek awakening hai – jo insaan ko God ki taraf le jaata hai.

stories.name: Temporary World
stories.answer: Dukh isliye hai kyunki duniya temporary hai; God hi eternal bliss hai.

stories.name: Test
stories.answer: Suffering ek test hai jo soul ko strong banata hai.

stories.name: Value of Joy
stories.answer: Bina dukh ke sukh ka value samajhna mushkil hai.

stories.name: Compassion
stories.answer: Dukh insaan me karuna aur daya jagata hai.

stories.name: Karma Result
stories.answer: Dukh zyada tar karma ka result hai; God justice karte hain.

stories.name: Soul Journey
stories.answer: Suffering is part of soul's journey.

stories.name: God's Support
stories.answer: God suffering nahi dete, balki usme support karte hain.

stories.name: Worldly Nature
stories.answer: Dukh duniya ka swabhav hai, God usse paar le jaane wale hain.

stories.name: Remembrance
stories.answer: Jahan dukh hai, wahan God ka smaran hi mukti ka raasta hai.

title: मृत्यु के बाद क्या होता है?
name: Ananya
description: आत्मा मृत्यु के बाद कहाँ जाती है?

stories.name: यात्रा
stories.answer: मृत्यु के बाद आत्मा अपनी यात्रा जारी रखती है – एक शरीर से दूसरे में।

stories.name: कर्मफल
stories.answer: आत्मा अगले जन्म में वही अनुभव करती है जो कर्मों के अनुसार बनता है।

stories.name: मोक्ष
stories.answer: जब आत्मा जन्म-मरण के चक्र से मुक्त हो जाती है, उसे मोक्ष मिलता है।

title: ध्यान का महत्व
name: Rohit
description: मनुष्य के जीवन में ध्यान क्यों ज़रूरी है?

stories.name: मन की शांति
stories.answer: ध्यान से मन शांत होता है और तनाव दूर होता है।

stories.name: आत्मज्ञान
stories.answer: ध्यान आत्मा से जुड़ने का माध्यम है।

stories.name: एकाग्रता
stories.answer: ध्यान से एकाग्रता और कार्यक्षमता बढ़ती है।

title: सपनों का रहस्य
name: Dev
description: सपने क्यों आते हैं और उनका अर्थ क्या है?

stories.name: अवचेतन मन
stories.answer: सपने हमारे अवचेतन मन की अभिव्यक्ति होते हैं।

stories.name: संकेत
stories.answer: कभी-कभी सपने भविष्य या मन की गहराई के संकेत देते हैं।

stories.name: मन की सफाई
stories.answer: सपने दिनभर के विचारों और भावनाओं की सफाई का तरीका भी हैं।

title: प्यार का असली अर्थ क्या है?
name: Osho
description: क्या प्रेम केवल संबंध है या जीवन का सार?

stories.name: निर्विरोध प्रेम
stories.answer: ओशो कहते हैं – सच्चा प्रेम अपेक्षारहित होता है, वह बस बहता है।

stories.name: प्रेम और स्वतंत्रता
stories.answer: प्रेम का अर्थ है दूसरे को उसकी स्वतंत्रता में स्वीकार करना।

stories.name: प्रेम ही ध्यान है
stories.answer: जब प्रेम शुद्ध हो जाता है तो वह ध्यान में बदल जाता है।

title: जीवन का उद्देश्य क्या है?
name: Osho
description: क्या जीवन का कोई लक्ष्य है या यह केवल जीने की कला है?

stories.name: जीवन का उत्सव
stories.answer: ओशो कहते हैं – जीवन को लक्ष्य नहीं, बल्कि उत्सव की तरह जियो।

stories.name: वर्तमान
stories.answer: जीवन का उद्देश्य केवल वर्तमान में जीना है।

stories.name: अनुभव
stories.answer: जीवन अनुभव करने के लिए है, समझाने के लिए नहीं।

title: ध्यान क्या है?
name: Osho
description: क्या ध्यान एक क्रिया है या एक अवस्था?

stories.name: शांत मन
stories.answer: ध्यान का अर्थ है – मन को मौन में डूबो देना।

stories.name: साक्षीभाव
stories.answer: ध्यान है – बिना हस्तक्षेप के देखना, केवल साक्षी होना।

stories.name: ध्यान ही मुक्ति
stories.answer: ओशो कहते हैं – ध्यान से ही मनुष्य जन्म–मृत्यु से मुक्त होता है।

title: ईश्वर है या नहीं?
name: Sadhguru
description: क्या ईश्वर कोई व्यक्ति है या केवल एक ऊर्जा?

stories.name: ऊर्जा
stories.answer: सद्गुरु कहते हैं – ईश्वर कोई व्यक्ति नहीं, यह सृष्टि की मौलिक ऊर्जा है।

stories.name: अनुभव
stories.answer: ईश्वर को तर्क से नहीं, केवल अनुभव से जाना जा सकता है।

stories.name: सृष्टि
stories.answer: ईश्वर का अर्थ है – यह पूरी सृष्टि, यह अस्तित्व।

title: कर्म का रहस्य
name: Sadhguru
description: क्या हमारा जीवन पूरी तरह से कर्मों पर निर्भर करता है?

stories.name: कर्म की परिभाषा
stories.answer: सद्गुरु कहते हैं – कर्म केवल भाग्य नहीं, यह हमारी स्मृति और क्रिया का संगम है।

stories.name: चयन
stories.answer: हर क्षण आप नए कर्म बना रहे हैं, आप जो चुनते हैं वही भविष्य बनाता है।

stories.name: मुक्ति
stories.answer: जब आप पूर्ण सजगता से जीते हैं तो कर्म से मुक्त हो जाते हैं।

title: योग का असली अर्थ
name: Sadhguru
description: क्या योग केवल व्यायाम है या कुछ और?

stories.name: एकता
stories.answer: योग का अर्थ है – स्वयं को पूरे अस्तित्व से जोड़ लेना।

stories.name: शरीर से परे
stories.answer: योग केवल आसन नहीं है, यह शरीर और मन से परे जाने का मार्ग है।

stories.name: आत्मबोध
stories.answer: योग आत्मा को पहचानने और पूर्ण जागरूकता पाने की साधना है।

title: मनुष्य के दुख का कारण क्या है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता के अनुसार मनुष्य क्यों दुखी होता है?

stories.name: मोह
stories.answer: अज्ञान और मोह से मनुष्य दुखी होता है।

stories.name: इच्छा
stories.answer: अत्यधिक इच्छाएँ दुख का मूल कारण हैं।

stories.name: अहंकार
stories.answer: स्वार्थ और अहंकार दुख को जन्म देते हैं।

stories.name: फल की चिंता
stories.answer: कर्म के फल की चिंता से ही मनुष्य दुखी होता है।

stories.name: असंतोष
stories.answer: संतोष न होना ही दुख का प्रमुख कारण है।

title: सच्ची भक्ति किसे कहते हैं?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में भगवान ने कैसी भक्ति को श्रेष्ठ बताया है?

stories.name: निष्काम भक्ति
stories.answer: फल की इच्छा बिना की गई भक्ति ही सच्ची है।

stories.name: समर्पण
stories.answer: मन, बुद्धि और आत्मा का पूर्ण समर्पण।

stories.name: समान भाव
stories.answer: सभी जीवों में परमात्मा को देखना ही सच्ची भक्ति है।

stories.name: श्रद्धा
stories.answer: अटूट श्रद्धा और विश्वास के साथ की गई भक्ति।

stories.name: प्रेम
stories.answer: भक्ति का आधार प्रेम है, न कि भय या स्वार्थ।

title: सफलता का रहस्य क्या है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता के अनुसार जीवन में सफलता कैसे मिलती है?

stories.name: निष्काम कर्म
stories.answer: फल की चिंता किए बिना कर्म करने से सफलता मिलती है।

stories.name: एकाग्रता
stories.answer: मन को स्थिर और एकाग्र रखना ही सफलता की कुंजी है।

stories.name: धैर्य
stories.answer: धैर्य और संयम से कार्य करना आवश्यक है।

stories.name: कर्तव्य पालन
stories.answer: अपने धर्म और कर्तव्य का पालन करने से सफलता निश्चित है।

stories.name: समर्पण
stories.answer: परमात्मा को समर्पित होकर किया गया कार्य सफल होता है।

title: ज्ञान क्या है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में किसे सच्चा ज्ञान कहा गया है?

stories.name: आत्मा का ज्ञान
stories.answer: आत्मा और शरीर के भेद को जानना ही ज्ञान है।

stories.name: सत्य की खोज
stories.answer: सत्य का अनुसंधान करना ही ज्ञान है।

stories.name: विनम्रता
stories.answer: विनम्र और जिज्ञासु होना ज्ञान का लक्षण है।

stories.name: भक्ति से ज्ञान
stories.answer: भक्ति से प्राप्त होने वाला आत्मबोध ही सच्चा ज्ञान है।

stories.name: अज्ञान का नाश
stories.answer: अज्ञान का नाश ही ज्ञान की प्राप्ति है।

title: सच्चा योगी कौन है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में योगी की पहचान क्या है?

stories.name: समभाव
stories.answer: जो सुख-दुःख, लाभ-हानि में समान रहता है।

stories.name: अहिंसा
stories.answer: जिसके मन में सबके लिए करुणा है।

stories.name: भक्ति
stories.answer: जो भगवान में लीन है वही श्रेष्ठ योगी है।

stories.name: संयमी
stories.answer: जो इंद्रियों पर नियंत्रण रखता है।

stories.name: त्यागी
stories.answer: जो स्वार्थ और अहंकार का त्याग करता है।

title: मन को कैसे नियंत्रित करें?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: अर्जुन ने श्रीकृष्ण से पूछा था - चंचल मन को कैसे वश में किया जाए?

stories.name: अभ्यास और वैराग्य
stories.answer: मन को वश में करने के लिए अभ्यास और वैराग्य दोनों आवश्यक हैं।

stories.name: धीरे-धीरे संयम
stories.answer: धीरे-धीरे और धैर्यपूर्वक मन को एकाग्र करना चाहिए।

stories.name: विचारों का निरीक्षण
stories.answer: मन में आने वाले विचारों को बिना जुड़े देखना शुरू करें।

title: सच्ची शांति कहाँ मिलती है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: जीवन में स्थायी शांति पाने का क्या मार्ग है?

stories.name: अंदर की खोज
stories.answer: शांति बाहरी चीज़ों में नहीं, बल्कि अपने भीतर खोजने से मिलती है।

stories.name: समानता का भाव
stories.answer: सुख-दुःख में समान रहना और किसी भी परिस्थिति से प्रभावित न होना।

stories.name: ईश्वर पर भरोसा
stories.answer: सब कुछ ईश्वर को समर्पित कर देने से मन शांत होता है।

title: What is true religion?
name: Mahabharata
description: In Mahabharata, what defines true 'Dharma'?

stories.name: Daya & Compassion
stories.answer: True religion is to show kindness to all living beings.

stories.name: Justice & Duty
stories.answer: Upholding justice and performing one's duty without selfish motives is Dharma.

stories.name: Truthfulness
stories.answer: Satya (truth) is the foundation of all Dharma.

title: Karma aur Bhakti me kya antar hai?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में कर्म योग और भक्ति योग को कैसे समझाया गया है?

stories.name: Karma - Action
stories.answer: Karma yoga is performing your duties without attachment to results.

stories.name: Bhakti - Devotion
stories.answer: Bhakti yoga is surrendering all your actions and thoughts to God.

stories.name: Final Unity
stories.answer: Ultimately, both paths lead to the same goal of union with the divine.

title: Why should we control our senses?
name: Upanishads
description: What do Upanishads say about controlling the senses?

stories.name: Peace of Mind
stories.answer: Controlling the senses leads to inner peace and stability of mind.

stories.name: Path to Liberation
stories.answer: A mind controlled by senses is bound to the material world; controlling them is the first step towards liberation.

stories.name: Self-Realization
stories.answer: Without control over senses, one cannot attain knowledge of the Self.

title: रामराज्य क्या है?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण के अनुसार आदर्श 'रामराज्य' कैसा था?

stories.name: न्यायपूर्ण शासन
stories.answer: रामराज्य में हर नागरिक को न्याय मिलता था, और कोई दुखी नहीं था।

stories.name: समृद्धि और सुख
stories.answer: यह ऐसा राज्य था जहाँ हर कोई सुखी और समृद्ध था।

stories.name: धर्म का पालन
stories.answer: लोग स्वेच्छा से धर्म का पालन करते थे, जिससे समाज में सद्भाव था।

title: पाप और पुण्य क्या हैं?
name: Vedas
description: वेद के अनुसार पाप और पुण्य की अवधारणा क्या है?

stories.name: पाप - अज्ञान
stories.answer: पाप वह कार्य है जो अज्ञान और स्वार्थ से किया जाता है।

stories.name: पुण्य - कर्तव्य
stories.answer: पुण्य वह है जो समाज और धर्म के हित में किया जाए।

stories.name: कर्मफल
stories.answer: हर क्रिया का फल होता है – पाप से दुख और पुण्य से सुख मिलता है।

title: सच्ची खुशी क्या है?
name: Osho
description: खुशी को कैसे परिभाषित किया जा सकता है?

stories.name: अंदर का आनंद
stories.answer: सच्ची खुशी बाहरी परिस्थितियों पर निर्भर नहीं करती, वह भीतर का आनंद है।

stories.name: क्षण में जीना
stories.answer: खुशी सिर्फ वर्तमान क्षण में जीने से मिलती है।

stories.name: साक्षीभाव
stories.answer: दुःख-सुख को समान भाव से देखना और स्वीकार करना ही सच्ची खुशी है।

title: Why is forgiveness important?
name: Kabir
description: Kabir's thoughts on the power of forgiveness.

stories.name: Freedom
stories.answer: Holding onto grudges is like carrying a heavy stone. Forgiveness sets you free.

stories.name: Inner Peace
stories.answer: Forgiving others is not for them; it is for your own peace of mind.

stories.name: God's Grace
stories.answer: The one who forgives is closer to God.

title: What is the true nature of God?
name: Vedas
description: How is God described in the Vedas?

stories.name: One & Infinite
stories.answer: God is one, but manifests in infinite forms and names.

stories.name: Formless & Formed
stories.answer: God is both formless (Nirguna) and with form (Saguna).

stories.name: Omnipresent
stories.answer: God is present everywhere and in every living being.

title: What is Moksha?
name: Upanishads
description: Upanishads ke anusar 'Moksha' ka arth kya hai?

stories.name: Freedom from Cycle
stories.answer: Moksha is liberation from the cycle of birth and death.

stories.name: Self-Knowledge
stories.answer: Moksha is the state of realizing your true self and oneness with Brahman.

stories.name: Eternal Bliss
stories.answer: It is a state of eternal peace and bliss, free from all suffering.

title: What is the difference between mind and intellect?
name: Upanishads
description: How do Upanishads differentiate between Manas and Buddhi?

stories.name: Mind's Role
stories.answer: The mind (Manas) is responsible for thoughts, desires and emotions.

stories.name: Intellect's Role
stories.answer: The intellect (Buddhi) is the discriminating faculty, which makes rational decisions.

stories.name: Mastery
stories.answer: True wisdom is when the intellect guides the mind, and not the other way around.

title: How to overcome fear?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में भय को दूर करने का क्या उपाय बताया गया है?

stories.name: Attachment
stories.answer: Fear arises from attachment to worldly things and outcomes.

stories.name: Action
stories.answer: Do your duty fearlessly, without concern for success or failure.

stories.name: Trust in God
stories.answer: When you surrender to God, you know you are protected and fear vanishes.

title: Ramayana ka mool sandesh kya hai?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण हमें जीवन के बारे में क्या सिखाती है?

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Ramayana teaches us the importance of Dharma in every aspect of life.

stories.name: Duty
stories.answer: It shows us how to perform our duties towards family and society, even in difficult times.

stories.name: Victory of Good
stories.answer: The epic proves that goodness and truth will always prevail over evil.

title: What is the true meaning of happiness?
name: Osho
description: Osho's perspective on true happiness.

stories.name: Beyond Joy
stories.answer: Happiness is not just joy; it is a state of being, beyond both joy and sorrow.

stories.name: Present Moment
stories.answer: True happiness comes from living fully in the present moment, without desire for future.

stories.name: Inward Journey
stories.answer: Happiness cannot be found outside; it is an inward journey.

title: मन को शांत करने के लिए क्या करें?
name: Sadhguru
description: सद्गुरु मन की शांति के लिए क्या उपाय बताते हैं?

stories.name: Meditation
stories.answer: Meditation helps you become an observer of your thoughts, not a slave to them.

stories.name: Breathing
stories.answer: Breathing exercises (Pranayama) are key to bringing calmness to the mind.

stories.name: Self-Awareness
stories.answer: When you are self-aware, you don't react to every thought or emotion.

title: What is the purpose of suffering?
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में दुख और पीड़ा का क्या महत्व है?

stories.name: Lessons
stories.answer: Suffering is a teacher; it teaches us valuable lessons we can't learn otherwise.

stories.name: Purification
stories.answer: Pain purifies the soul and helps us shed our attachments and ego.

stories.name: Growth
stories.answer: Just as fire strengthens steel, suffering strengthens the human spirit.

title: सत्य बोलने का क्या महत्व है?
name: Vedas
description: वेद में सत्य के महत्व पर क्या कहा गया है?

stories.name: Foundation
stories.answer: Satya (Truth) is the foundation of the universe. It is the highest Dharma.

stories.name: Path to God
stories.answer: By speaking the truth, one walks the path towards God.

stories.name: Power
stories.answer: The power of truth is immeasurable; it can overcome all obstacles.

title: What is the importance of a Guru?
name: Upanishads
description: Why is a Guru considered essential for spiritual knowledge?

stories.name: Dispels Ignorance
stories.answer: A Guru dispels the darkness of ignorance and guides us to the light of knowledge.

stories.name: Personal Experience
stories.answer: A Guru helps us go beyond theoretical knowledge and experience the truth ourselves.

stories.name: Pathfinder
stories.answer: The Guru is a guide who has already walked the path and can show us the way to liberation.

title: Why should we detach from results?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में कर्म के फल से अनासक्ति का क्या महत्व है?

stories.name: Mental Peace
stories.answer: When you are not attached to results, you are free from anxiety and stress.

stories.name: Better Performance
stories.answer: Detachment allows you to focus purely on the action, leading to better performance.

stories.name: Spiritual Growth
stories.answer: This detachment is the path to spiritual liberation and union with the divine.

title: पांडवों ने क्यों युद्ध किया?
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में पांडवों ने युद्ध क्यों लड़ा?

stories.name: Justice
stories.answer: Paandavon ne dushashtra aur anyay ke khilaaf nyay ke liye yudh kiya.

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Yudh dharm ki raksha ke liye tha, na ki rajya ya shakti ke liye.

stories.name: No Alternative
stories.answer: Sabhi shanti ke prayas asafal hone par yudh antim vikalp tha.

title: जीवन क्या है?
name: Osho
description: ओशो के अनुसार जीवन की परिभाषा क्या है?

stories.name: Celebration
stories.answer: Jeevan ek celebration hai, isko enjoy karo, na ki ek problem ki tarah jiyo.

stories.name: Growth
stories.answer: Jeevan ek growth process hai, har anubhav se sikhna hi jeevan hai.

stories.name: Flow
stories.answer: Jeevan ek nadi jaisa hai – iske flow ke saath jiyo, resist mat karo.

title: What is the secret of happiness?
name: Sadhguru
description: What does Sadhguru say about the secret to happiness?

stories.name: Inner Engineering
stories.answer: Happiness is not something you get, it's something you create inside you.

stories.name: Beyond Conditions
stories.answer: If your happiness depends on external conditions, it is not real happiness.

stories.name: Responsibility
stories.answer: Being happy is your own responsibility, not someone else's.

title: संसार और मोक्ष में क्या अंतर है?
name: Upanishads
description: उपनिषद के अनुसार 'संसार' और 'मोक्ष' में क्या भेद है?

stories.name: Samsara
stories.answer: Samsara is the cycle of birth, death, and rebirth driven by desires.

stories.name: Moksha
stories.answer: Moksha is the state of freedom from this cycle, attained through knowledge.

stories.name: Delusion
stories.answer: The world seems real due to delusion; Moksha is the realization of the truth.

title: How to live a virtuous life?
name: Ramayana
description: What does Ramayana teach about leading a virtuous life?

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Always follow the path of Dharma, even when it is difficult.

stories.name: Respect
stories.answer: Respect your elders and fulfill your promises.

stories.name: Humility
stories.answer: Remain humble and free from ego, just like Lord Rama.

title: कर्मों से मुक्ति कैसे मिलती है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता के अनुसार कर्म बंधन से मुक्ति का मार्ग क्या है?

stories.name: Sanyas
stories.answer: By renouncing the fruits of your actions (karmafal sanyas).

stories.name: Bhakti
stories.answer: By performing all actions as a dedication to the divine.

stories.name: Awareness
stories.answer: By acting with complete awareness and not being the 'doer'.

title: Why should one be humble?
name: Vedas
description: What do the Vedas say about the importance of humility?

stories.name: Foundation of Knowledge
stories.answer: Humility is the foundation upon which true knowledge is built.

stories.name: Respect
stories.answer: A humble person respects everyone and everything, which brings them respect in return.

stories.name: Path to Divinity
stories.answer: Humility allows one to see the divine in all beings and realize their own divinity.

title: सच्चा ज्ञान क्या है?
name: Kabir
description: कबीर के अनुसार 'ज्ञान' का क्या अर्थ है?

stories.name: Heart Knowledge
stories.answer: Sacha gyaan woh hai jo kitaabon mein nahi, dil mein ho.

stories.name: Experiential
stories.answer: Gyaan woh hai jo anubhav se milta hai, na ki sunne se.

stories.name: Self-Realization
stories.answer: Sacha gyaan hai apne aap ko pehchanna, apni atma ka gyaan.

title: Why should we not fear death?
name: Upanishads
description: What do the Upanishads say about the fear of death?

stories.name: Eternal Soul
stories.answer: The soul is eternal; only the body perishes. Death is just a change of clothes for the soul.

stories.name: Beginning of a new journey
stories.answer: Death is not an end, but the beginning of a new journey for the soul.

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: The fear of death comes from ignorance of our true, immortal nature.

title: क्या भगवान राम आदर्श पुरुष थे?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण में भगवान राम को 'मर्यादा पुरुषोत्तम' क्यों कहा गया है?

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Bhagwan Ram ne har paristhiti me dharma ka palan kiya.

stories.name: Kartavya
stories.answer: Unhone apne kartavyon ko sarvopari mana.

stories.name: Purity
stories.answer: Unka character, thought, aur action sab pure the.

title: मन को नियंत्रित करने का उपाय
name: Kabir
description: कबीर के अनुसार मन को वश में करने का तरीका क्या है?

stories.name: Bhakti
stories.answer: Bhakti aur Ishwar smaran se man shant ho jaata hai.

stories.name: Satsang
stories.answer: Man ko control karne ke liye sadhuon aur satya ke saath raho.

stories.name: Self-Reflection
stories.answer: Apne man ki chalta ko dekho, bina uske saath involve hue.

title: Why should we not be selfish?
name: Mahabharata
description: What does Mahabharata say about the dangers of selfishness?

stories.name: Destruction
stories.answer: Selfishness leads to the destruction of relationships and society.

stories.name: Pain
stories.answer: Selfishness brings pain not only to others but also to oneself.

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: The selfish person is ignorant of the interconnectedness of all beings.

title: सच्ची स्वतंत्रता क्या है?
name: Sadhguru
description: सद्गुरु के अनुसार 'स्वतंत्रता' का अर्थ क्या है?

stories.name: Inner Freedom
stories.answer: Sachi swatantrata bahari nahi, andar ki hai – man aur karm se.

stories.name: No Condition
stories.answer: Freedom is a state where you don't depend on any condition for your well-being.

stories.name: Responsibility
stories.answer: Freedom is not the absence of responsibility, but the ability to respond.

title: What is the true wealth?
name: Upanishads
description: According to the Upanishads, what is the ultimate wealth?

stories.name: Knowledge
stories.answer: The greatest wealth is not material possessions but the knowledge of the Self.

stories.name: Inner Peace
stories.answer: A mind at peace is a far greater treasure than any amount of money.

stories.name: Virtue
stories.answer: The real wealth is our virtue, kindness, and good deeds.

title: राम और रावण में क्या अंतर था?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण के अनुसार राम और रावण के चरित्र में मुख्य भेद क्या था?

stories.name: Dharma vs Adharma
stories.answer: Ram ne hamesha dharma ka palan kiya, jabki Ravan ne adharma ka.

stories.name: Ego vs Humility
stories.answer: Ravan ke paas shakti thi, par uska ant uske ahankar ne kiya.

stories.name: Love vs Attachment
stories.answer: Ram ka prem anasakt tha, jabki Ravan ka prem moh aur vasna par adharit tha.

title: मनुष्य का सबसे बड़ा शत्रु कौन है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता के अनुसार मनुष्य का सबसे बड़ा शत्रु कौन है?

stories.name: Anger
stories.answer: Krodh, isse hi manushya ki buddhi nasht hoti hai.

stories.name: Lust
stories.answer: Kaam, yaani atyadhik ichcha aur vasna.

stories.name: Ego
stories.answer: Ahankaar, jo gyaan aur satya ko chhupa leta hai.

title: What is the concept of 'Maya'?
name: Vedas
description: How do Vedas define the concept of 'Maya'?

stories.name: Illusion
stories.answer: Maya is the illusion that makes us see the temporary world as real.

stories.name: Cosmic Power
stories.answer: It is a cosmic power of God that creates the universe.

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: Maya is the ignorance that makes us forget our true self.

title: मनुष्य के जीवन का सार
name: Osho
description: ओशो के अनुसार 'मनुष्य' के जीवन का क्या सार है?

stories.name: Consciousness
stories.answer: Manushya ka jeevan uski chetna ko jagane ka ek avsar hai.

stories.name: Meditation
stories.answer: Jeevan ka saar hai dhyan, jo aapko andar ki duniya se jorta hai.

stories.name: Bliss
stories.answer: The essence of life is to experience the inner bliss, free from desires.

title: What is the greatest donation?
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में किस दान को सबसे महान बताया गया है?

stories.name: Vidya
stories.answer: Gyan ka daan sabse mahaan hai, kyunki woh akshay hai.

stories.name: Anxiety-free
stories.answer: Abhay daan, yaani kisi ko nirbhay karna, sabse bada daan hai.

stories.name: Charity
stories.answer: Food donation is the greatest charity for the one who is hungry.

title: जीवन में धैर्य का महत्व
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण हमें धैर्य के बारे में क्या सिखाती है?

stories.name: Example of Sita
stories.answer: Sita's patience in Lanka is a lesson on how to endure hardship.

stories.name: Ram's Patience
stories.answer: Ram's patience in waiting for his exile to end shows the power of patience.

stories.name: Victory
stories.answer: Patience is a key to victory; without it, one cannot achieve great goals.

title: How to manage desires?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में इच्छाओं को नियंत्रित करने का क्या उपाय है?

stories.name: Non-Attachment
stories.answer: Desires are born from attachment; by detaching, you control them.

stories.name: Conscious Action
stories.answer: Act with awareness, and not driven by desires.

stories.name: Higher Goal
stories.answer: Focus on a higher spiritual goal, and worldly desires will lose their power.

title: सच्चा सुख क्या है?
name: Kabir
description: कबीर के अनुसार सच्चा सुख क्या है?

stories.name: Detachment
stories.answer: Jab manasik ichchaon ka tyag hota hai, tab sacha sukh milta hai.

stories.name: Simplicity
stories.answer: Sacha sukh saralta aur santosh me hai, na ki bahut paane me.

stories.name: Oneness with God
stories.answer: Sacha sukh Bhagwan ke saath ekta me hai.

title: What is the true meaning of 'Karma'?
name: Mahabharata
description: How is the concept of 'Karma' explained in the Mahabharata?

stories.name: Cause & Effect
stories.answer: Karma is the universal law of cause and effect. Every action has a reaction.

stories.name: Choice
stories.answer: Our present is a result of our past karma, but our future is a result of our present choices.

stories.name: Right Action
stories.answer: True karma is performing the right action without selfish motives.

title: What is the true nature of the universe?
name: Vedas
description: How do the Vedas describe the nature of the universe?

stories.name: Divine Manifestation
stories.answer: The universe is a manifestation of the one supreme reality, Brahman.

stories.name: Cyclical
stories.answer: The universe goes through endless cycles of creation and dissolution.

stories.name: Interconnected
stories.answer: Everything in the universe is interconnected and interdependent.

title: What is the path to inner peace?
name: Upanishads
description: उपनिषद के अनुसार आंतरिक शांति कैसे प्राप्त की जा सकती है?

stories.name: Control of Senses
stories.answer: By controlling the mind and senses, one can attain peace.

stories.name: Self-Knowledge
stories.answer: Peace comes from realizing that your true self is Brahman.

stories.name: Detachment
stories.answer: Detachment from worldly desires and attachments leads to lasting peace.

title: Why should we be compassionate?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण में करुणा का क्या महत्व है?

stories.name: Divine Nature
stories.answer: Compassion is a divine quality; it is what separates humans from demons.

stories.name: Ram's Example
stories.answer: Ram's compassion for all beings, even his enemies, is a great lesson.

stories.name: Unity
stories.answer: Compassion fosters a sense of unity and love in society.

title: कर्मफल का क्या सिद्धांत है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में 'कर्मफल' के बारे में क्या कहा गया है?

stories.name: Universal Law
stories.answer: Karmafal is a universal law; every action has a consequence.

stories.name: No Control
stories.answer: Manushya ka karm par adhikar hai, par karmfal par nahi.

stories.name: Attachment is the cause
stories.answer: It is not the action but the attachment to its result that binds us.

title: What is the true purpose of life?
name: Vedas
description: What is the ultimate purpose of human life according to the Vedas?

stories.name: Dharma, Artha, Kama, Moksha
stories.answer: The four main purposes are Dharma (virtue), Artha (prosperity), Kama (desire), and Moksha (liberation).

stories.name: Realizing the Self
stories.answer: The ultimate goal is to realize the true self and merge with Brahman.

stories.name: Knowledge
stories.answer: To seek knowledge and live a life in harmony with the cosmos.

title: मन को एकाग्र कैसे करें?
name: Sadhguru
description: सद्गुरु एकाग्रता के लिए क्या बताते हैं?

stories.name: Sattvic Food
stories.answer: Sattvic (pure) food and lifestyle help in calming the mind.

stories.name: Right Breathing
stories.answer: Proper breathing techniques are essential for a focused mind.

stories.name: Detachment
stories.answer: Mind automatically focuses when it is not cluttered with desires.

title: What is the meaning of life?
name: Osho
description: Osho's unique perspective on the meaning of life.

stories.name: Journey
stories.answer: Life is a journey, not a destination. Live every moment fully.

stories.name: No Meaning
stories.answer: Life has no pre-determined meaning; you have to create your own.

stories.name: Bliss
stories.answer: The meaning of life is to live it with awareness and in a state of bliss.

title: मनुष्य का सबसे बड़ा गुण
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में मनुष्य का सबसे बड़ा गुण किसे माना गया है?

stories.name: Forgiveness
stories.answer: Kshama (forgiveness) is the greatest virtue of a human being.

stories.name: Compassion
stories.answer: Daya (compassion) is a quality that makes a person divine.

stories.name: Honesty
stories.answer: Truthfulness and honesty in all actions is a true mark of a great man.

title: How to overcome ego?
name: Upanishads
description: How do Upanishads advise on overcoming the ego?

stories.name: Self-Knowledge
stories.answer: By knowing your true self as Brahman, the ego disappears.

stories.name: Humility
stories.answer: Humility is a key practice to dissolve the ego.

stories.name: Detachment
stories.answer: Ego is nourished by attachment to things and results; detach to weaken it.

title: रावण का अंत क्यों हुआ?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण में रावण के अंत का मुख्य कारण क्या था?

stories.name: Ego
stories.answer: Uska ahankar hi uske vinash ka karan tha.

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: Usne gyaan hote hue bhi dharma ko nahi apnaya, yahi uski sabse badi bhool thi.

stories.name: Arrogance
stories.answer: Ravan's arrogance made him underestimate the power of God and righteousness.

title: क्या भगवान हर जगह हैं?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में भगवान की सर्वव्यापकता को कैसे समझाया गया है?

stories.name: Inner Self
stories.answer: I am the soul in every living being.

stories.name: Manifestation
stories.answer: Bhagwan kehte hain, main hi prakriti aur main hi iska saar hoon.

stories.name: Energy
stories.answer: God is the energy that permeates the entire universe.

title: What is the true measure of a man?
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत के अनुसार किसी व्यक्ति की महानता का पैमाना क्या है?

stories.name: Character
stories.answer: A man's greatness is measured by his character, not his wealth or power.

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: The one who follows Dharma, even in the face of death, is truly great.

stories.name: Humility
stories.answer: A great man is always humble, and a humble man is always great.

title: सच्ची मुक्ति क्या है?
name: Osho
description: ओशो के अनुसार 'मुक्ति' क्या है?

stories.name: Freedom from mind
stories.answer: Mukti is not from the world, but from the mind and its concepts.

stories.name: Awareness
stories.answer: Mukti is a state of complete awareness and consciousness.

stories.name: Living in Present
stories.answer: Mukti is living every moment as if it is your last.

title: What is the role of destiny?
name: Kabir
description: कबीर के अनुसार भाग्य और कर्म का क्या संबंध है?

stories.name: Effort
stories.answer: Bhagy se kuch nahi milta, mehnat se sab kuch milta hai.

stories.name: God's Will
stories.answer: Bhagya to Bhagwan ka likha hai, par karma insaan ke haath me hai.

stories.name: The Potter
stories.answer: Kabir says, you are the potter and your destiny is the pot you make.

title: What is the true form of God?
name: Vedas
description: वेद के अनुसार ईश्वर का सच्चा स्वरूप क्या है?

stories.name: Brahman
stories.answer: God's true form is Brahman – formless, eternal, and all-pervading.

stories.name: Omnipresent
stories.answer: God is not a person but a supreme cosmic energy present in all creation.

stories.name: Light
stories.answer: God is the ultimate light that dispels the darkness of ignorance.

title: जीवन में भय क्यों होता है?
name: Upanishads
description: उपनिषद के अनुसार मनुष्य को भय क्यों लगता है?

stories.name: Duality
stories.answer: Fear arises from the feeling of separation from the divine.

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: Bhaya ka mool karan hai atma aur sharir ke bhed ka gyaan na hona.

stories.name: Attachment
stories.answer: Attachment to temporary things and people is the source of all fear.

title: What is the lesson of Mahabharata?
name: Mahabharata
description: What is the ultimate lesson of the Mahabharata?

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Dharma is the foundation of everything. The one who follows Dharma wins in the end.

stories.name: Karma
stories.answer: Every action, whether good or bad, has its consequences.

stories.name: The Cycle of Life
stories.answer: Mahabharata teaches us about the endless cycle of life, duty, and spiritual growth.

title: सच्ची सेवा क्या है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में सच्ची सेवा का क्या अर्थ है?

stories.name: Selfless Action
stories.answer: Seva is performing your duty without any expectation of reward.

stories.name: God's Work
stories.answer: Sachi seva woh hai jo Bhagwan ko samarpit ho.

stories.name: Humility
stories.answer: Seva is doing good deeds with humility, seeing the divine in all.

title: Why should we be grateful?
name: Sadhguru
description: सद्गुरु के अनुसार आभार का क्या महत्व है?

stories.name: Abundance
stories.answer: Gratitude brings abundance; it makes you aware of what you have.

stories.name: Inner State
stories.answer: Gratitude is an inner state, not just an expression.

stories.name: Joy
stories.answer: Being grateful is a way to live a joyous and fulfilled life.

title: सच्चा ज्ञान और अज्ञान
name: Upanishads
description: उपनिषद के अनुसार 'ज्ञान' और 'अज्ञान' में क्या भेद है?

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: Agyan is the belief that the body and mind are our true self.

stories.name: Knowledge
stories.answer: Gyan is the realization that we are the eternal soul.

stories.name: Path
stories.answer: The path of ignorance leads to bondage, while the path of knowledge leads to liberation.

title: कर्ण का क्या सबक है?
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में कर्ण के जीवन से हमें क्या सीखने को मिलता है?

stories.name: Loyalty
stories.answer: Karn ki nishtha aur mitrata adbhut thi, par galat jagah thi.

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Dharma parivar aur mitrata se bhi upar hota hai.

stories.name: Consequences of choices
stories.answer: Hamaare chunav humaare bhagya ka nirnay karte hain.

title: जीवन में दुःख क्यों आते हैं?
name: Osho
description: ओशो के अनुसार दुःख का कारण क्या है?

stories.name: Desire
stories.answer: Dukh ka mool karan hai ichcha, jab ichcha poori nahi hoti to dukh hota hai.

stories.name: Resistance
stories.answer: Dukh is not in the event, but in your resistance to it.

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: Agyan aur chetna ki kami hi dukh ka karan hai.

title: What is the true power?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण के अनुसार सच्ची शक्ति क्या है?

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Sachi shakti dharam ko apnane aur satya ke raste par chalne me hai.

stories.name: Self-Control
stories.answer: The greatest power is the power to control yourself and your desires.

stories.name: Virtue
stories.answer: Virtue and righteousness are more powerful than any weapon or army.

title: How to attain inner bliss?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में आत्म-ज्ञान और आनंद को कैसे प्राप्त किया जा सकता है?

stories.name: Mind Control
stories.answer: By calming the mind and senses, one can experience inner bliss.

stories.name: Oneness
stories.answer: Anand tab milta hai jab aap apne aap ko Parmatma ka ansh samjhte hain.

stories.name: Bhakti
stories.answer: Bhakti aur Ishwar se prem hi sacche anand ka rasta hai.

title: What is the ultimate knowledge?
name: Vedas
description: वेद के अनुसार सबसे श्रेष्ठ ज्ञान क्या है?

stories.name: Brahma Gyan
stories.answer: Brahma Gyan, or the knowledge of Brahman, is the ultimate knowledge.

stories.name: Self-Knowledge
stories.answer: To know yourself is to know the universe and its creator.

stories.name: One beyond all
stories.answer: The knowledge of that One, which is the source of all existence, is the highest.

title: सच्ची वीरता क्या है?
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में सच्ची वीरता की परिभाषा क्या है?

stories.name: Righteousness
stories.answer: Sachi veerta hai dharma ke liye ladna, na ki shakti ke liye.

stories.name: Humility
stories.answer: A truly brave person is humble and compassionate, not arrogant.

stories.name: Self-Control
stories.answer: The one who can conquer their own mind and senses is the bravest.

title: How to handle sorrow?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में दुख और शोक को कैसे दूर करें?

stories.name: Acceptance
stories.answer: Accept that sorrow and joy are temporary and a part of life.

stories.name: Karma
stories.answer: Focus on your duty, and not on the sorrow that comes from it.

stories.name: Detachment
stories.answer: Don't be attached to worldly things, and sorrow will lose its grip.

title: What is the true nature of love?
name: Osho
description: ओशो के अनुसार प्रेम का सही अर्थ क्या है?

stories.name: Freedom
stories.answer: Love is not bondage; it is the freedom to be yourself.

stories.name: Meditation
stories.answer: Sacha prem dhyan jaisa hai – it's a state of being, not a relationship.

stories.name: Unconditional
stories.answer: Love is giving without expecting anything in return.

title: What is the meaning of 'Om'?
name: Vedas
description: वेद में 'ॐ' का क्या महत्व है?

stories.name: Cosmic Sound
stories.answer: Om is the cosmic sound of creation and the essence of all mantras.

stories.name: Brahman
stories.answer: Om represents the supreme reality, Brahman.

stories.name: Union
stories.answer: Chanting Om brings about the union of the individual self with the supreme self.

title: सच्चा योगी कौन है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता में योगी की पहचान क्या है?

stories.name: Equanimity
stories.answer: Sacha yogi woh hai jo sukh-dukh aur labh-hani me samaan rahe.

stories.name: Self-Control
stories.answer: Yogi is the one who has full control over his mind and senses.

stories.name: Detached Action
stories.answer: A true yogi acts without attachment to the results of his actions.

title: What is the true nature of God?
name: Upanishads
description: Upanishad ke anusar Ishwar ka swaroop kya hai?

stories.name: Brahman
stories.answer: Ishwar is the universal consciousness, Brahman.

stories.name: Atman
stories.answer: The Atman (soul) in every living being is a part of God.

stories.name: Beyond words
stories.answer: God's true nature cannot be described in words; it can only be experienced.

title: जीवन में दान का महत्व
name: Mahabharata
description: महाभारत में दान का क्या महत्व है?

stories.name: Virtue
stories.answer: Daan (donation) is one of the highest virtues a person can have.

stories.name: No attachment
stories.answer: Sacha daan woh hai jo bina kisi phal ki ichcha ke kiya jaaye.

stories.name: Selflessness
stories.answer: Daan makes a person selfless and brings inner peace.

title: Why should we be truthful?
name: Ramayana
description: रामायण में सत्य के महत्व पर क्या कहा गया है?

stories.name: Purity of Soul
stories.answer: Truthfulness is the reflection of the purity of the soul.

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Satya (truth) is the foundation of Dharma.

stories.name: Lord Rama's example
stories.answer: Lord Rama always upheld truth, even at the cost of his kingdom.

title: मन की शक्ति क्या है?
name: Sadhguru
description: सद्गुरु के अनुसार मन की शक्ति क्या है?

stories.name: Creator
stories.answer: Man is a powerful creator; it can create both joy and sorrow.

stories.name: Tool
stories.answer: Man ek tool hai, iska sahi istemal karna seekho.

stories.name: Freedom
stories.answer: Sachi shakti hai apne man ke upar niyantran paana.

title: What is the real meaning of sin?
name: Vedas
description: वेद के अनुसार पाप का असली अर्थ क्या है?

stories.name: Ignorance
stories.answer: Sin is not an act, but a state of ignorance of our true self.

stories.name: Action against Dharma
stories.answer: Any action that goes against Dharma is a sin.

stories.name: Selfishness
stories.answer: Every selfish act, done out of ego, is a sin.

title: सच्ची शांति क्या है?
name: Bhagavad Gita
description: गीता के अनुसार सच्ची शांति कैसे मिलती है?

stories.name: Inner State
stories.answer: Sachi shanti bahari paristhitiyo me nahi, man ke andar hai.

stories.name: Equanimity
stories.answer: The one who is equanimous in all situations attains peace.

stories.name: Surrender
stories.answer: By surrendering to God, you find a peace that is beyond understanding.

title: What is the message of Mahabharata?
name: Mahabharata
description: Mahabharata se hume kya sikh milti hai?

stories.name: Dharma
stories.answer: Mahabharata teaches us that the path of Dharma is the only path to victory and peace.

stories.name: Justice
stories.answer: It shows that justice will always prevail, even if it takes a long time.

stories.name: Consequences
stories.answer: Every action, good or bad, has its consequences, and no one can escape them.

title: What is the true nature of God?
name: Kabir
description: कबीर के अनुसार ईश्वर का सच्चा स्वरूप क्या है?

stories.name: Nirakar
stories.answer: God is formless and cannot be confined to any temple or idol.

stories.name: Within us
stories.answer: God is not outside, but within every living being.

stories.name: Love
stories.answer: God is love; to love all is to love God.
